verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You have buried my sins in the depths of the sea.
You've carried my guilt far away.
As far as the east is from the west,
You've removed my transgressions from me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So I'll tell of Your mercies; I'll sing of Your grace;
I'll walk in Your liberty.
And I'll live in the awesome light of Your love,
'Cause I know that I am free.
